sourcing.instructions: Magnesium Oxide can be obtained from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: Magnesium Oxide can be obtained from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. In a clean container, measure and combine 32.0 g of Magnesium Oxide and 40.0 g of Phosphorus Pentoxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean container, measure and combine 32.0 g of Magnesium Oxide and 40.0 g of Phosphorus Pentoxide.

steps: 1. Transfer the paste into a suitable mold with dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the paste into a suitable mold with dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature gradually (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature gradually (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Carefully demold the solid sample after it has cooled completely.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Carefully demold the solid sample after it has cooled completely.
